channel.title: Sander Schutten's Blog
channel.description: Recent content on Sander Schutten's Blog

item.title: Suppress XML documentation warnings for a project
item.description: When I turned on the feature to output an XML documentation file when building my project I’m confronted with a load of warnings that the XML documentation is missing for some method. While it’s nice to see these warnings I didn’t want to see them anymore without lowering the warning level. So I searched the net and found a way to suppress these warnings: Go to the properties of your project.

item.title: Identify node type in XSLT
item.description: For a BizTalk solution I needed to write some custom XSLT. In the XSLT I needed to determine the node type and according to the type execute a specific piece of XSLT. Unfortunately it’s not very easy to get the node type in XSLT. It took me a while to find this post which explains a solution for this. Maybe it could help you out. http://www.stylusstudio.com/xsllist/200312/post00260.html

item.title: Happy new year!
item.description: From this place I would like to wish both readers of this blog a happy new year. My target for 2006 is to grow this blog and hopefully more people will read it.
